item.title: CRED
item.description: In this episode we talk about CRED (https://www.cred.club/) app and recent talk news. Overview CRED is a fintech startup founded in 2018 in Bangalore, India by Kunal Shah. Their main business idea is around helping customers benefit by earning reward points on making credit card payments through the CRED app. Funding Seed round was from Sequoia India, Ribbit and RTP global. They are currently in series B with raising $4M in the latest round as of this writing.
